profile.bio: Trevor crafts elegant multi-device experiences with pixels and magic while tanked up on artisan coffee and Col-Erase pencil shaving fumes. He can also be found going on about Disneyland (again), playing video games terribly, or drawing a face on something.

With a passion for people at her core, Lindsay rides around on her Vespa, organising, solving and fixing everything in her path, whilst singing about it all in sweet Motown style - she's in a cool band, y'know. Lindsay's driven by a need to help make the lives of others as easy as possible â€” no matter the task! L to the I-N-D-S-A-Y! Go Lindsay!! *CLAP*-*CLAP* *CLAP* Go Lindsay!!
